verbs.description: While [V: hosting] [ARG1: South Korean President Moon Jae - in] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] said there was a " substantial chance " a planned summit between him and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un would n't happen .
